replies.body: Removing from rotation until fixed. This exact same thing happened in Oldvicus and yet, removed for the same reason I believe. Hopefully one of the sistahood members or Evocal can fix it; everytime I try to put a map in the void I fail and it gens more ;-{
replies.body_tagged: Removing from rotation until fixed. This exact same thing happened in Oldvicus and yet, removed for the same reason I believe. Hopefully one of the sistahood members or Evocal can fix it; everytime I try to put a map in the void I fail and it gens more ;-{

replies.body:
This is the third time this happened with Steampunk. (Both of the previous two times, it disappeared from the rotation for several months, then came back with absolutely no changes to the flatland whatsoever.)
I reported this same thing to some mods on TeamSpeak (i.e.: Robo) a day before I started telling others about it, with the hope/intention that only the lava would be removed, and that the rest of the Village(s) be preserved.
